sourcesContent:
<template v-for="Producto in inventario">
  <Producto :name="Producto.name" :amount="Producto.amount"></Producto>
</template>
<script>
import axios from "axios";
import Producto from "./Producto.vue";
export default {
  name: "Inicio",
  components: {
    Producto,
  },
  data: function () {
    return {
      inventario: [],
    };
  },
  methods: {
    getLista: function () {
      axios
        .get(`https://supermercado-be.herokuapp.com/inventarios/`, {
          headers: {},
        })
        .then((result) => {
          this.inventario = result.data;
        })
        .catch((error) => {
          console.log(error);

          alert(error + ". ERROR: Fallo en la consulta de inventarios.");
        });
    },
  },
  created: function () {
    this.getLista();
  },
};
</script>
<style scoped>
.administrar-container {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-around;
}

.contenedor {
  height: 450px;
  width: 450px;
  background: #9f83fa;
  border-radius: 20px;
  align-items: center;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  justify-content: center;
  align-items: center;
}
.UserView {
  margin: 10px 0px 0px 500px;
}
div {
  margin: 10px 0px 0px -450px;
}
h1 {
  font-size: 40px;
  color: rgb(255, 255, 255);
  text-align: center;
}
button {
  width: 300px;
  height: 40px;
  margin-bottom: 5px;
  color: #000000;
  text-align: center;
  font-size: 20px;
  border-radius: 10px;
  background: #ffffff;
  border: 1px solid #000000;
  filter: blur(0.4px);
  border-radius: 20px;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.5s;
}

button:hover {
  width: 300px;
  height: 40px;
  text-align: center;
  font-size: 20px;
  border-radius: 10px;
  border: 1px solid #000000;
  filter: blur(0.4px);
  border-radius: 20px;
  color: #e5e7e9;
  background: crimson;
  border: 1px solid #283747;
}
</style>
